content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences, but to answer your question, Mike Oldfield has been a significant and influential figure in the world of music. He has released numerous albums spanning different genres and styles, including progressive rock, electronic, and classical music. Some of his other popular works include his debut album "Tubular Bells," which includes the theme music for the movie "The Exorcist," "Hergest Ridge," "Ommadawn," and "Incantations," to name a few. His music is known for its complex instrumental compositions, innovative use of technology, and uniquely eclectic sound. If you enjoyed "To France," you may want to check out some of his other works to explore his wide-ranging musical talents.
